original_text: Brethren, I write no new commandment unto you, but an old commandment which ye had from the beginning. The old commandment is the word which ye have heard from the beginning.
korean_text: 사랑하는 자들아 내가 새 계명을 너희에게 쓰는 것이 아니라 너희가 처음부터 가진 옛 계명이니 이 옛 계명은 너희가 들은 바 말씀이거니와

sentences.original_text: Brethren, I write no new commandment unto you
sentences.korean_translation: 형제들아, 나는 너희에게 새 계명을 쓰지 아니하노니

sentences.original_text: which ye had from the beginning
The old commandment is the word
which ye have heard from the beginning
